branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY2H, Mechanically Jointed - High Precision Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>The MY2H Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. The enhanced design offers a 30% lower profile compared to the MY1H. The integrated high precision linear guide improves positioning accuracy and repeatability and is available in either single axis or double axis for increased rigidity. The cylinder component can be detached from the guide units or workpiece for easy maintenance and cylinder replacement. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
